original_title: Je, Nous, I or Eye, Us
overview: "The film Je, Nous, I or Eye, Us is a mini essay that replies to a question about subjectivity in the 1970s while I was making my film 'The Camera Je, La Camera: I' about taking photographs. The new film from 2014 uses footage shot at the time of The Camera: Je but never used in 1976 and 1977 and adds to the 16mm film a series of titles about a photographerâ€™s subjectivity then and now." (Babette Mangolte)
title: Je, Nous, I or Eye, Us
